verses.name: Acts 13:42
verses.text: And when the Jews were gone out of the synagogue, the Gentiles besought that these words might be preached to them the next sabbath.

verses.name: Acts 13:43
verses.text: Now when the congregation was broken up, many of the Jews and religious proselytes followed Paul and Barnabas: who, speaking to them, persuaded them to continue in the grace of God.

verses.name: Acts 13:44
verses.text: And the next sabbath day came almost the whole city together to hear the word of God.

verses.name: Acts 13:45
verses.text: But when the Jews saw the multitudes, they were filled with envy, and spake against those things which were spoken by Paul, contradicting and blaspheming.
